# DOIcreator: Add DOIs to References in a Word (.docx) File

```{r}
# Load package
library(DOIcreator)
```


# IMPORTANT:
# 1. Create a separate Word file that contains ONLY your references.
# 2. Save it on your computer, for example:
#       "C:/folder/subfolder/file.docx"
# 3. Choose a NEW output file name to avoid overwriting:
#       "C:/folder/subfolder/file_doi.docx"
#
# NOTE:
# • The created file will NOT have numbering.
# • In Microsoft Word, press Ctrl+A and click the numbering icon to add numbers.
# • Then copy the updated references into your manuscript.
# • Always cross-check DOIs for accuracy.


# ------------------------------------------------------------
# Run the function see help(package="DOIcreator)
# ------------------------------------------------------------


# After running:
# • Open file_doi.docx
# • Add numbering in Word
# • Paste into your manuscript
